abilities: {{Ability List| {{Melee|0-500}}|{{Ability|[[Fire Wave|Great Fire Wave]]|0-358|element=fire}}|{{Ability|[[Fireball]]|makes you [[Invisible]] for about 20 seconds|element=invisible}}|{{Ability|yellow sparks [[Berserk]]|0-190|element=?}}|{{Ability|[[Great Energy Beam]]|0-244|element=energy}}|{{Ability|[[Mana Drain|Ultimate Mana Drain Spark Bomb]]|200-300|element=manadrain}}|{{Ability|Frequent [[Self-Healing]]|200-450|element=healing}} }}
name: Tirecz
behaviour: Fights until death, retargets very often.
strategy:
'''[[Knight]]s''': Stay diagonal. Avoid his waves and beams at all cost!
'''[[Sorcerer]]s, [[Druid]]s and [[Paladin]]s''': kill at range. Don't get too close or in the way of the waves and beams.
